Package grafiosch.repository

Class TenantBaseImpl<T>

java.lang.Object
grafiosch.repository.BaseRepositoryImpl<T>
grafiosch.repository.TenantBaseImpl<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the entity type handled by this repository
All Implemented Interfaces:
TenantBaseCustom
Direct Known Subclasses:
TenantJpaRepositoryImpl
public abstract class TenantBaseImpl<T> extends BaseRepositoryImpl<T> implements TenantBaseCustom
Abstract base implementation for tenant-specific data operations. Provides concrete implementations for data deletion and export functionality.

  • Method Details

    • deleteMyDataAndUserAccount

      public void deleteMyDataAndUserAccount() throws Exception
      Description copied from interface: TenantBaseCustom
      Deletes all personal data and user account for the currently authenticated user. This operation removes all user-specific data from the system and cannot be undone.
      Specified by:
      deleteMyDataAndUserAccount in interface TenantBaseCustom
      Throws:
      Exception - if the deletion operation fails or user is not authenticated

    • getExportPersonalDataAsZip

      public void getExportPersonalDataAsZip(jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response) throws Exception
      Exports personal data for the currently authenticated user as a ZIP file. The ZIP file contains two SQL scripts:
      1. A DDL (Data Definition Language) script (e.g., "gt_ddl.sql") for table structures.
      2. A DML (Data Manipulation Language) script ("gt_data.sql") containing the user's personal data as INSERT statements.
      The method retrieves the user from the security context, generates the DML data using MySqlExportMyData#exportDataMyData(), and then streams the DDL file and the generated DML data into a ZIP file directly to the HttpServletResponse.
      Specified by:
      getExportPersonalDataAsZip in interface TenantBaseCustom
      Parameters:
      response - The HttpServletResponse to which the ZIP file will be written. The response headers will be set for a file attachment named "gt.zip".
      Throws:
      Exception - if any error occurs during data export, resource loading, ZIP stream creation, or writing to the response stream. This can include IOException during stream operations or exceptions from MySqlExportMyData.exportDataMyData().
